Uses of Interface
imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ProgressReporter

  • Packages that use ProgressReporter 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.lib.filter  
    imagingbook.lib.filter.examples  
    imagingbook.lib.filter.linear  
    imagingbook.lib.util.progress  
    imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ij  
    imagingbook.pub.color.filters

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.lib.filter

      Classes in imagingbook.lib.filter that implement ProgressReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GenericFilter
      This is the (abstract) root class of the generic filter hierarchy.
      class  GenericFilterScalar
      This (abstract) class represents a filter which treats all pixel values as scalars.
      class  GenericFilterScalarSeparable
      This (abstract) class represents a generic scalar filter whose pixel-operation is x/y-separable.
      class  GenericFilterVector
      This (abstract) class represents a filter which treats all pixel data as vectors.
      class  GenericFilterVectorSeparable
      This (abstract) class represents a generic vector filter whose pixel-operation is x/y-separable.

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.lib.filter.examples

      Classes in imagingbook.lib.filter.examples that implement ProgressReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ExampleFilterScalar  
      class  ExampleFilterVector  
      class  FilterShowProgressExample  

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.lib.filter.linear

      Classes in imagingbook.lib.filter.linear that implement ProgressReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GaussianFilter
      This class implements a 2D Gaussian filter by extending LinearFilter.
      class  GaussianFilterSeparable
      This class implements a separable 2D Gaussian filter by extending LinearFilterSeparable.
      class  LinearFilter
      This class represents a 2D linear filter specified by an arbitrary 2D convolution kernel.
      class  LinearFilterSeparable
      This class represents a 2D linear filter that is x/y-separable and specified by two 1D-kernels.

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.lib.util.progress

      Constructors in imagingbook.lib.util.progress with parameters of type ProgressReporter 
      Constructor Description
      ProgressMonitor​(ProgressReporter target)
      Constructor, starts monitoring immediately.
      ProgressMonitor​(ProgressReporter target, boolean autoStart)
      Constructor, optionally starts monitoring immediately or waits for its Thread.start() method to be called (which starts the associated thread).

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ij

      Constructors in imagingbook.lib.util.progress.ij with parameters of type ProgressReporter 
      Constructor Description
      ProgressBarMonitor​(ProgressReporter target)  

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.pub.color.filters

      Classes in imagingbook.pub.color.filters that implement ProgressReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ScalarMedianFilter
      Ordinary (scalar) median filter for color images implemented by extending the GenericFilter class.
      class  VectorMedianFilter
      Basic vector median filter for color images implemented by extending the GenericFilterVector class.
      class  VectorMedianFilterSharpen
      Sharpening vector median filter for color images implemented by extending the GenericFilterVector class.

    • Uses of ProgressReporter in imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters

      Classes in imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters that implement ProgressReporter 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BilateralFilterScalar
      Scalar version, applicable to all image types.
      class  BilateralFilterScalarSeparable
      Scalar version, applicable to all image types.
      class  BilateralFilterVector
      Vector version, for RGB images only (accepts ColorProcessor only).
      class  BilateralFilterVectorSeparable
      Separable vector version, for RGB images only (accepts ColorProcessor only).
      class  KuwaharaFilterScalar
      Scalar version.
      class  KuwaharaFilterVector
      Vector version (applicable to ColorProcessor only).
      class  NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar
      Scalar version.
      class  NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector
      Vector version.
      class  PeronaMalikFilterScalar
      Scalar version, without gradient array.
      class  PeronaMalikFilterVector
      Vector simplified version with greatly reduced memory requirements.
      class  TschumperleDericheFilter
      This class implements the Anisotropic Diffusion filter proposed by David Tschumperle in D.
